items.sentence: What kind of equipment is installed in the classrooms?
You\'ve worked with Tom for a long time, haven\'t you?
I really don\'t understand what you\'re talking about.
This is one of the most popular restaurants in Boston.
Why is Boston such a popular destination for tourists?
Tom doesn\'t know where he\'s going to live next year.
You don\'t need me to do that for you anymore, do you?
You don\'t seem to be as impressed as Tom seems to be.
You won\'t be able to convince Tom to stop doing that.
A kiss without a mustache is like an egg without salt.
After killing Tom, Mary buried him in a shallow grave.
I\'m not used to having this kind of time on my hands.
I\'m now rich enough to afford to get anything I want.
I\'m only going to say this once, so listen carefully.
We can\'t even be certain Tom will attend the meeting.
Tom cracked several jokes before beginning his speech.
Tom didn\'t read any of the messages Mary sent to him.
Tom pretended that he didn\'t know what was happening.
Tom says that he wasn\'t the one who broke the window.
It\'ll be difficult to complete this report by Monday.
I was caught in a shower and was drenched to the skin.
I was the one who taught Tom how to play the mandolin.
Some people think that French is a difficult language.
The person Tom and I were waiting for didn\'t turn up.
I can\'t just not do anything. I have to do something.
I can\'t tell you how much I appreciate all your help.
I don\'t think that Tom realizes how rude he\'s being.
Everyone wants me to go, but I don\'t feel like going.
Everybody is very busy getting ready for the New Year.
Tom just took a chance and called Mary to ask her out.
Tom knew Mary was unlikely to ask John not to do that.
Tom knew that Mary told John she was going to do that.
Tom, Mary and John were playing tag on the playground.
Tom doesn\'t speak French as well as I thought he did.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary will ever come back to Boston.
Tom doesn\'t think that Mary was the one who did that.
Tom doesn\'t want anybody asking questions about Mary.
I don\'t understand what you\'re trying to accomplish.
Tom opened the freezer and got some ice for his drink.
Tom said that he wanted to forget about what happened.
Tom says that he is able to communicate with the dead.
Is there any possibility that he\'ll win the election?
Mary and Alice showed me pictures of their boyfriends.
Mary is a very attractive woman in her early thirties.
Mary is in the other room trying on her wedding dress.
I pinched myself to make sure that I wasn\'t dreaming.
What difference does it make if people don\'t do that?
I took some money out of my wallet and gave it to Tom.
I wish my parents would let me stay up later at night.
I wonder whether Tom really knows how to speak French.
